title: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or layout open space, in any layout required /provided as per these Regulation
clause_text: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or layout open space, in any layout required /provided as per these Regulation. For any existing amenity, allocation of the use or zone which is not subjected to acquisition. The incentive TDR will not be applicable to deemed reservations. Existing nalla, River, Natural Stream, Natural Pond, Tank, Water bodies etc. Transferable Development Rights (TDR) against surrender of land :-
section: 3.0 CASES NOT ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS ( TDR ):-

source_pdf.text_snippet: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or layout open space, in any layout required /provided as per these Regulation.
